column4: im trying to setup openssh-server so I can ssh into my linux box from vista with putty. I installed openssh-server but cant seem to figure out how to configure it, can anyone help me?
do you see ssh or port 22 listed as listening if you netstat -tap
are you trying to connect on a LAN, or from the WAN side?
you need to make sure to use the proper IP address which can be found by ifconfig
